name: Docker Controller
desc: Docker Controller program with a Graphical User Interface (GUI) built using Flask API to create a web app. It allows users to manage Docker containers, images, volumes, and networks.

name: Car Price Prediction
desc: Developed a machine learning model using linear regression to predict car prices based on key attributes, integrated into a Flask-based web app for user-friendly access.

name: AWS EC2 Instance Management using Hand Gestures
desc: This project Uses OpenCV and cvzone's HandTrackingModule to control EC2 instances via hand gestures.

name: Distance of Face from Camera
desc: It demonstrates face detection and calculating the distance of a detected face from the camera.

name: Flipkart Product Scraping
desc: It utilizes the requests library for making HTTP requests and the BeautifulSoup library for parsing HTML content.

name: Flask  Dockerfile
desc: This Dockerfile sets up a Flask web app server on redhat/ubi8 .
